AccessModuleWrap< T > Class Template Reference

Finds and returns the pointer to a module of type T. Uses FindModule<>::findSubModule(), FindModule<>::findHost(). See usage e.g. at ChannelAccess. More...

#include <FindModule.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename T = cModule>
class AccessModuleWrap< T >

Finds and returns the pointer to a module of type T. Uses FindModule<>::findSubModule(), FindModule<>::findHost(). See usage e.g. at ChannelAccess.
